title: Tetsu's Page
content:
**Hi!** I'm Tetsu, and I [http://scp-int.wikidot.com/tetsusquared translate] and occasionally write SCPs.

+ My articles
++ The Minecraft Division
◉ **[[[secure-facility-dossier-site-418|]]]** 
> //Site-418, the Foundation's first (and currently only) virtual containment facility, is built within the popular video game Minecraft, and is responsible for containing anomalies that are difficult to contain in the real world.//
▣ **[[[SCP-6468]]]** - pvp potion by dado
> //When a player consumes the potion by holding the right mouse button, an unknown mechanism causes their right index finger to vibrate at a rate of 200 Hz.//
▣ **[[[peace-of-mind-for-the-wavering-girl|]]]**
> //Perhaps what the Minecraft Division needed was someone like Dawn.//
▣ **[[[http://scp-int.wikidot.com/scp-cn-3513|SCP-CN-3513]]]** - The OPERATOR Protocol
> //Minecraft is the best-selling game of all time, after all, so I think we should pay it a bit more attention.//
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box |author=tetsusquared]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:license-box-end]]
author: tetsusquared
